content.json:
# 游늵 Azuria - Dashboard de Monitoramento Principal

Este dashboard fornece uma vis칚o abrangente da performance e sa칰de da aplica칞칚o Azuria em produ칞칚o.

---
## 游 Core Web Vitals - Performance Metrics

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp {TimeRange:query}
| where name startswith "CoreWebVitals."
| summarize 
    avg_value = avg(value),
    p95_value = percentile(value, 95),
    count_measurements = count()
    by name, bin(timestamp, 5m)
| render timechart with (title="Core Web Vitals - Tend칡ncias de Performance")
content.title: Core Web Vitals Timeline

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp {TimeRange:query}
| where name startswith "CoreWebVitals."
| summarize 
    current_avg = avg(value),
    rating_good = countif(tostring(customDimensions.rating) == "good"),
    rating_needs_improvement = countif(tostring(customDimensions.rating) == "needsImprovement"),
    rating_poor = countif(tostring(customDimensions.rating) == "poor")
    by metric = name
| extend 
    good_percentage = rating_good * 100.0 / (rating_good + rating_needs_improvement + rating_poor),
    needs_improvement_percentage = rating_needs_improvement * 100.0 / (rating_good + rating_needs_improvement + rating_poor),
    poor_percentage = rating_poor * 100.0 / (rating_good + rating_needs_improvement + rating_poor)
| project metric, current_avg, good_percentage, needs_improvement_percentage, poor_percentage
content.title: Core Web Vitals - Distribui칞칚o de Ratings

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange:query}
| summarize 
    request_count = count(),
    avg_duration = avg(duration),
    p95_duration = percentile(duration, 95),
    success_rate = avg(case(success == true, 100.0, 0.0))
    by bin(timestamp, 5m)
| render timechart with (title="Requests - Volume e Performance")
content.title: Request Performance

content.query:
dependencies
| where timestamp {TimeRange:query}
| summarize 
    dependency_count = count(),
    avg_duration = avg(duration),
    success_rate = avg(case(success == true, 100.0, 0.0))
    by target, bin(timestamp, 5m)
| render timechart with (title="Dependencies - Performance por Target")
content.title: Dependency Performance

content.query:
exceptions
| where timestamp {TimeRange:query}
| summarize error_count = count() by bin(timestamp, 5m), type
| render timechart with (title="Errors ao Longo do Tempo")
content.title: Error Timeline

content.query:
exceptions
| where timestamp {TimeRange:query}
| summarize error_count = count() by type, method, outerMessage
| top 10 by error_count desc
| project ["Error Type"] = type, ["Method"] = method, ["Message"] = outerMessage, ["Count"] = error_count
content.title: Top Errors

content.query:
pageViews
| where timestamp {TimeRange:query}
| summarize 
    unique_users = dcount(user_Id),
    page_views = count(),
    avg_duration = avg(duration)
    by bin(timestamp, 5m)
| render timechart with (title="Usu치rios Ativos e Page Views")
content.title: User Activity

content.query:
pageViews
| where timestamp {TimeRange:query}
| summarize page_views = count() by name
| top 10 by page_views desc
| render piechart with (title="P치ginas Mais Visitadas")
content.title: Top Pages

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange:query}
| where name == "calculation_completed"
| summarize calculation_count = count() by bin(timestamp, 5m)
| render timechart with (title="C치lculos Completados por Minuto")
content.title: Calculations Timeline

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange:query}
| where name in ("marketplace_view", "profile_update", "settings_change")
| summarize event_count = count() by name, bin(timestamp, 5m)
| render timechart with (title="Eventos de Neg칩cio")
content.title: Business Events
